reviewText: I had read excerpts from this book and had seen the video. I purchased this book to give it as a wedding gift as I found that many of these things helped me when I first got married. Simple things like allowing my husband to go to his "cave" when he is mad and not to chase him down with insentient words. It is a great book that helps you understand the basics of your spouse and why they react so differently than you do to life situations. It is written by a husband and wife and they have wonderful insights that everyone can glean some bits of wisdom from.
Avoid buying this one...it contains but one simple concept but drags on, and on, with no particular place to go.
